name: Alaya & Soad's Gift
subtitle: Safe Quran Learning for Families
description:
Alaya & Soad's Gift helps families learn the Quran through trusted stories, recitation, and child-safe guidance.

WHY FAMILIES CHOOSE IT
• Child-safe by default with parent controls
• Offline-first Quran and stories for reliable access
• Progress safety with backup/export tools
• Clear subscription and restore experience

WHAT YOU GET

PROPHET STORIES
Explore 24 prophet stories from the Quran with age-appropriate language, lesson highlights, and immersive narration.

KIDS MODE
A dedicated learning space with parent gate, guided lessons, and positive reinforcement designed for children.

QURAN READER + RECITATION
Read and listen with 20+ reciters, translation support, and study tools.

AI TUTOR
Ask questions about stories, verses, and Islamic learning topics. Parents can enable/disable AI tutor anytime.

ISLAMIC TOOLS
Prayer times, Qibla direction, and calendar tools in one place.

OFFLINE + SYNC
Download key content for offline use. Optional parent-enabled cloud sync plus local backup/restore support protects learning progress.

FREE FEATURES
• Prophet stories
• Quran reader basics
• Daily AI tutor allowance
• Daily kids lessons allowance

PREMIUM
• Unlimited AI tutor and kids content
• Expanded reciter and tools access
• Enhanced offline library
